original_text: The rock badger eats its food twice. But its feet are not in two separate parts. They must not eat the rock badger.
korean_text: 사반도 새김질은 하되 굽이 갈라지지 아니하였으므로 너희에게 부정하고

sentences.original_text: The rock badger eats its food twice.
But its feet are not in two separate parts.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그 발은 두 개의 분리된 부분으로 되어있지 않다.

sentences.original_text: They must not eat the rock badger.
